original_text: “Then the master told his servant, ‘Go out to the roads and country lanes and compel them to come in, so that my house will be full.
korean_text: 주인이 종에게 이르되 길과 산울타리 가로 나가서 사람을 강권하여 데려다가 내 집을 채우라

sentences.original_text: Then the master told his servant
and compel them to come in
so that my house will be full
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내 집이 가득 차게 하려고
